The government isn't going to solve everyone's problem, the highest I can expect from them is security, there is a good reason why we aren't taught about how to make money in school, the government will seize to exist if everyone is rich, there will be chaos, who is going to be my maid? Who is going to work on the oil rigs? Who is going to dig the ground for natural resources? Who is going to construct the bridges? Workers exists because of the future of every countries and schools was created in such a way that you graduate to work under the government.Forget what you think you know, the situation of countries is getting worsen, you just need to work on yourself, be a man of creativity if you want to change your tight situation, as things are getting more advanced you also start becoming more advance.Free money isn't coming, be creative enough to start making money and forget what the government have to offer, it won't favour the government if they are helping people anyhow.The ultimate goal of the government is 'KEEP THEM POOR".
